title: "Duke Global Mental Health Conference 2024"
subtitle: "Building a Global Mental Health Community: Research, Policy, and Practice Across Disciplines"

The [Duke Center for Global Mental Health](https://globalhealth.duke.edu/center-global-mental-health) held its first Duke Global Mental Health Conference on October 8, 2024, in Trent Semans Center on Duke's campus. Our theme was: Building a Global Mental Health Community: Research, Policy, and Practice Across Disciplines. This one-day event brought together leaders, researchers, practitioners, and advocates from the Duke community and our partners around the world to share our work and ideas for working together.
